CapsuleHand¶

A grahics hand class that draws a stylized representation of a hand.

class Leap::Unity::CapsuleHand

A basic Leap hand model constructed dynamically vs.

using pre-existing geometry

Public Functions

override bool SupportsEditorPersistence()

Returns whether or not this hand model supports editor persistence.

This is false by default and must be opt-in by a developer making their own hand model script if they want editor persistence.
